title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Botanical and cloud sketches near Quito, Ecuador", June 24, 1857
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at center left:  Lugt 457d
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457c
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with numbers at various locations, and at upper left: 4- Intensely blue light / 5- blue purple shadow / 6- orange / 7- very dark; again, at upper right:  2 yellow flowers/ 3- Beautiful velvety olive brown / orange luminous / grass, green seed tops luminous yellow / green grass luminous edge; again, at center bottom: June 24th / -57 / Templo del sol ; and at lower right:  5- red between 2- Brown green / 6 luminous 3- green clear / 4- yellowish / green dark / lines yellowish /dark bottoms  [ between (?)]-.
description: Horizontal view of clouds over mountain ridges across upper portion of sheet with plants growing on a ruined wall at center surrounded by detail of plants filling lower portion.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Botanical and cloud sketches near Quito, Ecuador", June 24, 1857.
June 24, 1857. Graphite on brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-236.
